def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_triangle = is_triangle([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_small_dark = is_small(x, ctx) and is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_bigger_lighter_x = is_larger(y, x, ctx) and is_lighter(y, x, ctx)
        check_z_bigger_lighter_x = is_larger(z, x, ctx) and is_lighter(z, x, ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_triangle
            and check_x_small_dark
            and check_y_bigger_lighter_x
            and check_z_bigger_lighter_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_small_light = is_small(x, ctx) and is_lighter(x, y, ctx)
        check_y_dark_bigger_x = is_dark(y, ctx) and is_larger(y, x, ctx)
        check_y_down_right_x = is_below(y, x, ctx) and is_right(y, x, ctx)
        check_no_other_small_black = all([
            not (is_small(dot, ctx) and is_dark(dot, ctx))
            for dot in idxs if dot not in [x,y]
        ])
        if (
            check_xy_small_light
            and check_y_dark_bigger_x
            and check_y_down_right_x
            and check_no_other_small_black
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def select(state):
    # Select a dot.
    return state
state = select(state)
